html:
News Releases, Media Advisories

November 24, 2003

ATTENTION WIRE SERVICES, DAYBOOK EDITORS:
FINAL AUDIT REPORT ON
CLAY Jr. FOR CONGRESS
The Federal Election Commission has made available the final report on Clay Jr. for Congress (MO 1st District). This audit covers the period of January 1, 2001 through December 31, 2002.

Contact: FEC Press Office (202) 694-1220, 999 E Street NW
title: Final Audit Report on Clay Jr. For Congress is Available
